title: Samsung 840 EVO
extract: Samsung SSD 840 EVO Specifications and Features. Samsung is to offer no less than five versions of the 840 EVO which includes a 120GB, 250GB, 500GB, 750GB and 1 TB models. ... The 840 EVO series will come with Toggle NAND, flash memory from Samsung's new 1xnm node. As stated we expect that to be 19nm.Jul 25, 2013
